page.title: 10 LEISURE IN DENTON.
page.content: I like watching the stars and planets. I am a member of the Junior Astronomical Society. I also like running and I go to a club on Tuesdays and Thursdays. I play the violin and I have lessons on Mondays.I also play the recorder which I learn at school. My pets are a dog a cat,a gerbil,a rabbit and three guinea pigs. I have a BBC B computer which I sometimes use in my spare time. I like nature and rock scrambling and wildlife. My favourite sports are cricket and rounders. My Dad is an architect and designs houses. My Mum works as a cleaner twice a week. I have a brother and a sister.
